thread.title: Lionel Messi talks going "very well" as Barcelona look to tie down star man to new deal
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi talks going "very well" as Barcelona look to tie down star man to new deal

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Lionel Messi talks going "very well" as Barcelona look to tie down star man to new deal
text:
Sport Lionel Messi talks going "very well" as Barcelona look to tie down star man to new deal The Argentine ace is in the final 18 months of his contract and is yet to agree an extension Share Barcelona are confident of keeping Lionel Messi (Photo: Getty) Share Get FC Barcelona updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Barcelona are confident of tying Lionel Messi to a new deal at the Nou Camp. 
The Argentine ace, who has scored 481 goals in 557 games for La Liga champions, is in the final 18 months of his contract and is yet to agree an extension. 
Barca chief Josep Bartomeu insists the club will put out all the stops to keep hold of their star man, and technical secretary Robert Fernandez is confident of retaining their best players. 
"Leo's renovation is going very well, very well," Fernandez told RAC1. "I'm very relaxed, as I was before with [Javier] Mascherano, [Sergio] Busquets, [Luis] Suarez or Neymar. Read More Lionel Messi splashes the cash on two vintage bottles of wine for his mother's birthday Messi has smashed 481 goals for the Catalans (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"And I am now with Messi, as I am with Andres Iniesta or [Marc-Andre] Ter Stegen. We're working and I'm convinced that they'll continue with Barca. 
"It doesn't matter much who will be the first to renew. There will be people who want to poison the situation, but we've been working on this issue for a long time." poll loading Will Lionel Messi sign a new contract with Barcelona? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
